text: Ludovic Robeet (born 22 May 1994) is a Belgian professional road bicycle racer, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Career== Robeet won the combativity award at stage 2 of the 2016 Tour de Wallonie. He competed in the 2017 Liège–Bastogne–Liège, but did not finish. ==Major results== ;2014 : 3rd Overall Flèche du Sud ;2017 : 2nd Circuit de Wallonie ;2019 : 1st Stage 4 Settimana Internazionale di Coppi e Bartali ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian male cyclists
title: Ludovic Robeet
